statements: SELECT * FROM LegislationDatabase WHERE vote='yes';
SELECT politician_id, bill_id FROM LegislationDatabase WHERE vote='no';
SELECT * FROM LegislationDatabase ORDER BY vote_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(bill_id) FROM LegislationDatabase;
SELECT politician_id, COUNT(*) AS vote_count FROM LegislationDatabase GROUP BY politician_id;
SELECT * FROM LegislationDatabase LIMIT 10;
SELECT politician_id, vote_date FROM LegislationDatabase WHERE vote='yes' ORDER BY vote_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT politician_id, bill_id, vote, vote_date FROM LegislationDatabase WHERE vote IN ('yes','no') AND politician_id = 100 ORDER BY vote_date ASC, politician_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT politician_id) AS num_politicians, COUNT(DISTINCT bill_id) AS num_bills FROM LegislationDatabase WHERE vote='no' GROUP BY vote;
SELECT politician_id, MAX(vote_date) AS latest_vote FROM LegislationDatabase GROUP BY politician_id HAVING COUNT(bill_id) > 1 ORDER BY latest_vote DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers WHERE state='California';
SELECT name, party FROM lawmakers WHERE party='Democratic';
SELECT id, name, state FROM lawmakers WHERE party='Republican' ORDER BY state DESC;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers WHERE district=5 AND party='Independent' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT bill_id, title, vote_result FROM bills WHERE voter_id=123;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers WHERE state='California' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, party FROM lawmakers WHERE party='Republican' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE vote_result='passed' AND title LIKE '%tax%' ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT name, party, state, district FROM lawmakers WHERE district=9 AND party='Democratic';
SELECT title, description, voter_id FROM bills INNER JOIN lawmakers ON bills.voter_id = lawmakers.id WHERE vote_result='passed';
SELECT * FROM voting_records;
SELECT bill_id, vote FROM voting_records ORDER BY vote DESC;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers WHERE party = 'Republican';
SELECT title, introduced_date FROM bills WHERE introduced_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, party, state FROM lawmakers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM voting_records WHERE vote = 'Yes';
SELECT name, party FROM lawmakers ORDER BY party DESC, name ASC;
SELECT title, description FROM bills WHERE introduced_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT v.vote, l.name, b.title FROM voting_records v JOIN lawmakers l ON v.lawmaker_id = l.lawmaker_id JOIN bills b ON v.bill_id = b.bill_id WHERE l.party = 'Republican';

SELECT b.title, b.introduced_date, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_records v JOIN bills b ON v.bill_id = v.bill_id GROUP BY b.title, b.introduced_date HAVING total_votes >= 10 ORDER BY b.introduced_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers;
SELECT lawmaker_name, party_affiliation FROM lawmakers WHERE party_affiliation='Republican';
SELECT bill_title, bill_category FROM bills ORDER BY bill_category ASC;
SELECT district_name, state_name FROM districts WHERE state_name='California';
SELECT vote_result, vote_date FROM voting_records WHERE lawmaker_id=1 AND vote_result='Yes';
SELECT * FROM lawmakers WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT lawmaker_name, party_affiliation FROM lawmakers WHERE district_id = 3 ORDER BY lawmaker_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_category = 'Healthcare' AND bill_title LIKE '%care%';
SELECT bill_title, count(*) AS vote_count FROM bills JOIN voting_records ON bills.bill_id = voting_records.bill_id GROUP BY bill_title HAVING vote_count > 100;
SELECT bill_title, vote_result FROM bills JOIN voting_records ON bills.bill_id = voting_records.bill_id WHERE vote_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY vote_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers;
SELECT name, party FROM lawmakers WHERE party = 'Democratic';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT title FROM bills ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT c.name, ca.lawmaker_id FROM committees c JOIN committee_assignments ca ON c.committee_id = ca.committee_id;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers WHERE party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, party FROM lawmakers WHERE district = 'District 5' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE status = 'Passed' AND description IS NOT NULL;

SELECT lawmakers.name, committees.name FROM lawmakers JOIN committee_assignments ON lawmakers.id = committee_assignments.lawmaker_id JOIN committees ON committee_assignments.committee_id = committees.committee_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, MAX(vote_date) AS latest_vote_date FROM voting_records;
